item.title: Replace-by-Fee Bug (CVE-2021-31876)
item.description: Intro Aaron van Wirdum: 00:00:08 Live from (?), Aruba and Utrecht, the Netherlands, this is The Van Wirdum Sjorsnado. Sjors Provoost: 00:00:15 Hello, welcome, and listeners, sorry for the maybe not perfect sound quality, because we have to make do with the remote recording. Aaron van Wirdum: 00:00:24 Yeah, for the second time since we’re making our show my laptop broke, so here I am on my phone. Sjors Provoost: 00:00:32
